titles.title: Football Fairness Act of 2007
A bill to permit the National Football League to restrict the movement of its franchises, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S388-389)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
1/10/2007--Introduced.
Football Fairness Act of 2007 - Provides that it shall not be unlawful under the antitrust laws for the National Football League to enforce rules authorizing its membership to decide that a member club shall not be relocated.
